title: Update background and theme with design-focused color scheme

requirements.text: Replace the current teal/emerald color scheme with a new design-focused color palette that reflects UI/UX design principles and creative work, using colors appropriate for a design portfolio (avoid generic blue/purple unless contextually relevant to design tools)

acceptanceCriteria: New color scheme is applied throughout the portfolio (buttons, accents, gradients, borders)
Colors reflect design industry aesthetics (e.g., design tool brand colors, creative industry palettes)
Color scheme maintains WCAG accessibility compliance
Theme is distinct from the previous teal/emerald palette

requirements.text: Update the AnimatedBackground component with a new background design that aligns with the design-focused theme, replacing the current grid pattern with design-related visual elements or patterns
acceptanceCriteria: Background animation reflects UI/UX design context (e.g., wireframe grids, design system patterns, interface elements)
New background complements the updated color scheme
Animation remains subtle and does not distract from content
Background maintains smooth performance across devices

requirements.text: Update all glassmorphism card effects, gradients, and overlays to use the new design-focused color palette consistently across all sections (Hero, About, Experience, Projects, Skills, Contact)
acceptanceCriteria: All glassmorphism effects use colors from the new palette
Gradient overlays are updated to match the design theme
Visual consistency is maintained across all portfolio sections
Glass effects remain visually appealing with the new colors

requirements.text: Update the Tailwind CSS configuration and global CSS variables in frontend/index.css and frontend/src/index.css to define and apply the new design-focused color scheme using OKLCH color space
acceptanceCriteria: CSS custom properties are updated with new color values
Tailwind configuration includes new color definitions
All components automatically inherit the new theme colors
Dark mode styling is preserved with the new palette

constraints: Do not change the backend (main.mo remains empty)
Preserve all existing functionality and animations
Maintain WCAG accessibility compliance with new colors
Keep Plus Jakarta Sans font and overall layout structure
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Adding new animation types beyond color updates
